page.title: 16Commercial Activity
page.content: There is very little commerce in Shorwell apart from a general store which also serves as the post office. There is one public house, "The Crown", which has recently been rebuilt and modernised but in a way which fits in with surrounding cottages. Bar meals are served there as well as drinks. There is also a builder's yard which has a good stock of building materials. Farming dominates the landscape and is by far the major activity. In Shorwell, based around Northcourt manor, there is a market garden which is particularly busy in summer selling "self pick" fresh fruit and vegetables, especially raspberries and strawberries. At Yafford the mill, zoo, museum and adventure playground make up a considerable and profitable tourist attraction.
